Subroutine vom_get_hourly_clim

528 : 
529 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
530 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
531 : !+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
532 : !*-----Climate and Calendar data reading--------------------------------
533 : 
534 :       subroutine vom_get_hourly_clim ()
535 :       use vegwatmod
536 :       use vegmod
537 :       implicit none
538 : 
539 :       INTEGER :: ii, i, h, oldh, stat
540 :       INTEGER :: dummyint1, dummyint2, dummyint3, dummyint4
541 : 
542 :       open(kfile_hourlyweather, status='old', iostat=stat,             &
543 :      &     file=sfile_hourlyweather(1:len_trim(sfile_hourlyweather)))
544 :       if (stat .ne. 0) then
545 :         close(kfile_hourlyweather)
546 : 
547 : !       * Creating hourly climate data from daily data
548 : 
549 :         open(kfile_dailyweather, status='old', iostat=stat,            &
550 :      &       file=sfile_dailyweather(1:len_trim(sfile_dailyweather)))
551 :         read(kfile_dailyweather,*)
552 :         do i = 1, N__
553 :           read(kfile_dailyweather,'(4i8,8f8.2)') dayyear(i), day(i),   &
554 :      &      month(i), year(i), tmax(i), tmin(i), rainvec(i), epan(i),  &
555 :      &      srad(i), vpvec(i), press(i), cavec(i)
556 :         enddo
557 :         close(kfile_dailyweather)
558 : 
559 :         open(kfile_hourlyweather, iostat=stat,                         &
560 :      &       file=sfile_hourlyweather(1:len_trim(sfile_hourlyweather)))
561 :         write(kfile_hourlyweather,'(5a8,5a11)') '   hour', ' dayyear', &
562 :      &    '     day', '   month', '    year', '       tair',            &
563 :      &    '         vd', '       parh', '      rainh', '      cah'
564 : 
565 : !       * Calculation of derived parameters
566 : 
567 :         call vom_calc_derived()
568 : 
569 :         close(kfile_hourlyweather)
570 : 
571 :       endif
572 :      
573 : 
574 : !       * Reading hourly climate data if available
575 : 
576 :       open(kfile_hourlyweather, status='old', iostat=stat,             &
577 :      &     file=sfile_hourlyweather(1:len_trim(sfile_hourlyweather)))
578 :       read(kfile_hourlyweather,*)
579 :       ii = 1
580 :       oldh = 99
581 :       do i = 1, Nh_
582 :         read(kfile_hourlyweather,'(5i8,5e11.3)') h, dummyint1,       &
583 :    &      dummyint2, dummyint3, dummyint4, tairh(i), vdh(i),         &
584 :    &      parh(i), rainh(i), cah(i)
585 :         if (h .lt. oldh) then
586 :           dayyear(ii) = dummyint1
587 :           day(ii)     = dummyint2
588 :           month(ii)   = dummyint3
589 :           year(ii)    = dummyint4
590 :           ii = ii + 1
591 :         endif
592 :         oldh = h
593 :         gammastarvec(i) = 0.00004275d0 * E__ ** ((18915.d0 * (-25.d0 &
594 :    &                    + tairh(i))) / (149.d0 * R__ * (273.d0       &
595 :    &                    + tairh(i))))      ! (Out[274], derived from (3.25))
596 :       enddo
597 :       close(kfile_hourlyweather)
598 :       
599 : 
600 :       return
601 :       end subroutine vom_get_hourly_clim
